Title: Mudanza Exhibition by María JL Hierro
Description: Mudanza exhibition by Huelva-born artist María JL Hierro at the Museo Pérez Guerra in Cortelazor la Real. Opening on August 27 at 8:00 p.m. Open until September 10.
Keywords: María JL Hierro, Mudanza exhibition, Museo Pérez Guerra, Cortelazor la Real, contemporary art, tipoesía, visual poetry, Galería Laecléctica, art exhibitions in Spain, conceptual art
